reviewText: Great DVD for a great player
I loved this DVD!!! It took me back to my high school days. I watched it and it took me back to some great times. The Era of Bulls vs. Knicks.

Patrick Ewing is one among a great many who did not win it all in the fullness of his career; to me, it matters not. He was a fantastically original player, dominant in the paint, and a leader amongst his peers. Where are the heroes? Here is one. A truly great gentleman.
this dvd is awesome! The best thing too is that I got this dvd at the 99 cent store and it was only a buck!!! Yeah...that's what I'm talking about!
I loved it,but the disapointment is that he never got the championship ring - even after all the years he played, and all the points he made.
this video shows him in his prime as well as when he wasn't so good. This video is a must have for EWING fans.
